chunk:
Jamieson Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Serum

Brand: Jamieson

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: Aqua/Water, glycerin, sodium hyaluronate, Aloe barbadensis (aloe) leaf juice, phenoxyethanol, caprylyl glycol, vitamin B5 (D-Panthenol), acrylates/C10-30 alkyl acrylate crosspolymer, hydrolyzed collagen, potassium sorbate, sodium gluconate, sodium b

gluconate, sodium benzoate

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
